data.name: Gator Brigade: The First Real Stab At It
data.detailed_description:
.

Somewhere, dug deep into the great mountains, an architectural feat of wonder slumps wounded and rotten.
Within the walls of the Great Pit lies decrepit and shady characters in vein hopes of seeking fortune, valor and a sense of raw lawlessness and rugged freedom that could never be dreamt upon on the surface.

And then there was you:
The baby faced brat who saw sights through silk lined books, desperate to return a stolen trinket to a wealthy father in hopes of mending a flickering arranged marriage.
But no book, scroll, tale or shanty could of prepared you for this sort of violent madness.
Surrounded by Murderers, Rapists and Thieves, you better wish you were dead.

data.short_description: Within the walls of the Great Pit lies decrepit and shady characters in vein hopes of seeking fortune, valor and a sense of raw lawlessness and rugged freedom that could never be dreamt upon on the surface.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: The latest version of your graphics card drivers
  • Additional Notes: A HTML5 compatible browser
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual-core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A nVidia or AMD graphics card with latest drivers.

content_descriptors.notes: Gator Brigade features a tiny amount of Blood and Moderate Threatening Violence aswell as a lot of Vulgar, Crude Language.
